title: Low and slow leg of lamb with red wine gravy and mint sauce
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '2 parsnips, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '4 sticks celery, chopped', '5 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 (1.5kg) whole leg of lamb', '2 teaspoons mixed herbs', '250ml red wine', '250ml vegetable or lamb stock', '2 tablespoons cornflour', 'BistoÂ® lamb gravy mix (optional)', '2 mint leaves, chopped', '8 tablespoons vinegar']
